text_stim: Pigeons are birds that live in cities and parks. They have pretty feathers and make soft cooing sounds. They love to eat seeds and crumbs.
Butterflies are beautiful insects with colorful wings. They start as tiny caterpillars, then change into butterflies in a magical process called metamorphosis.
Winter is a cold season with snowflakes and frosty air. We wear warm clothes, build snowmen, and drink hot cocoa. It's a fun, chilly time of year!
Chefs make yummy food for us to eat. They cook in kitchens, mixing ingredients to create delicious meals. They are like artists with food!
The moon is a magical night friend that changes shape every night. Sometimes it's a big, round circle, other times just a tiny sliver. It lights up the sky and makes bedtime special.
